name: Lift Bumper
description:
CONTROLS: 
- Click/Touch: Activate green lockers.
- Drag Downwards: Pull the mass.
- Release: Release the mass.
- Drag Upwards: Look through upward.

Lift Bumper (aka Newton's Tower) is a super-simple physics jumper developed during HappyGameJam 2020  which jammers must design and develop games based on 4 subjects:

- Runner
- Satisfying
- Frustrating
- Physics
